page.title: 07Shilton School and community
page.content: The school is a daily meeting place for mums from{Barnacle,Ansty}and {Shilton.}It is near the church and the vicar visits regularly.The pupils go to the{old folks home}and the {Baptists'Chapel.}Occasionally meetings are held there, but there is no {Parents Teachers Association}.About 20 years ago the parents donated money to build a small outdoor{swimming pool. In{1977}it was recommended that the school should be abolished,but there was such an outcry, from the village , that it was kept on.About{10 years ago the school took pupils from the ages {4_12}.There were{127}children in the school then. But now children leave the school at the age of 8 and go to {Wolvey School, 2 miles}away.After this most children go to{Nicholas {Chamberlaine Comprehensive School}in {Bedworth,5 miles}away.
